Enjoy Your

Holiday

PET BOARDING
Short term and long term pet board. Luxury dog kennels, exercise.
CAT BOARDING
Your pets will also be exposed to plenty of human interaction, time outside.
PET SPA
We have a variety of quality shampoos as well as medicated shampoo.

About us

From the time our friends sniff their way through the door in the morning until they wag their tails out in the afternoon, we cater to their nature.

Dog Boarding

While you’re on holiday, here’s where furry friends will spend their time.
VIEW MORE

Cat Boarding

We have highest quality accommodations for even the fussiest feline.
VIEW MORE

Pet Grooming

Your dog will leave feeling happy, looking and smelling great.
VIEW MORE

Pet Taxi

If you are short on time we can arrange taxi transport for you.
VIEW MORE

Pet Boarding Facility

ENORMOUS CAGES
We have multiple doors to to make sure cats don't get outside. Pet safety is very important to us and we have fire detectors all throughout our facility.
FOUR-HOURS DAILY-PLAY INCLUDED
We keep every cat separate on play times - unless from the same family - so that there are no spats between cats in our enviroment.
VIEW GALLERY

ABOUT USWe keep them happy

WELL-TRAINED STAFF

Our staff learn proper handling, symptoms of illness, expressions, and body language.

METICULOUS ABOUT MEDS

Snacks are available throughout the day and fresh water is constantly available.

WHAT TO BRING

If your dog has separation anxiety we encourage you to bring something that smells like home.
